cbir.interfaces

Interface RelevanceFeedback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bayesian, MarsGaussian, MarsGaussianImproved, MarsIDF, NearestNeighbors

    public interface RelevanceFeedback
    This is the Relevance Feedback Method interface.
    Author:
    Chris Wendler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ImageContainer> relevanceFeedbackIteration(Retriever retriever, ImageContainer query, DescriptorType type, Metric metric, java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives, java.util.List<ImageContainer> negatives, int resultAmount)
      Performs a relevance feedback iteration.

    • Method Detail

      • relevanceFeedbackIteration

        java.util.List<ImageContainer> relevanceFeedbackIteration(Retriever retriever,
                                                        ImageContainer query,
                                                        DescriptorType type,
                                                        Metric metric,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> negatives,
                                                        int resultAmount)
        Performs a relevance feedback iteration. Side effect: all the RF Methods add the positively and negatively marked images to the query Image object.
        Parameters:
        retriever - the retriever which is used to search.
        query - the query image.
        type - the descriptortype which was used for the query.
        positives - the images marked as positive.
        negatives - the images marked as negative.
        resultAmount - the number of desired results.
        Returns:
        the results after considering the user feedback.
